name: Metanoia
description:
Metanoia means changing one's mind, the process experiencing of a psychotic "breakdown" subsequent positive psychological re-building or "healing".



In this album, the four songs have their own emotions.
Switching between songs is a change of feeling. So, we hoped that the listeners will be able to
feel the process of transformation in his feelings.

It contains four songs that have their own emotions. Hoping you guys will be able to feel the process of the transformation of hearts/feelings and reflect the inner peace

Tracklist :
1. Aloysivs Nitia - Memory Stream
2. Mathces - Heaven's Gate
3. Chlvn - 1/4
4. SAXXAMOTO - reverie



Duration: 13:04
Year: 2021
Format: Mp4
Size: 96 MB

Visual by: Aloysius Nitia
All tracks mastered by: Aloysius Nitia
